exampleEn: Investors often underestimate market volatility.
Financial success is within your grasp with proper planning.
exampleKo: 적절한 계획으로 재정적 성공이 당신의 수중에 있습니다.

exampleEn: High absenteeism affects productivity and profitability.
exampleKo: 높은 결근율은 생산성과 수익성에 영향을 미칩니다.

exampleEn: Her financial acumen led to substantial returns.
exampleKo: 그녀의 재정적 통찰력은 상당한 수익으로 이어졌습니다.

exampleEn: He is adept at identifying investment opportunities.
exampleKo: 그는 투자 기회를 식별하는 데 숙련되어 있습니다.

exampleEn: The fund adheres to strict investment guidelines.
Adverse market conditions affected portfolio performance.
exampleKo: 불리한 시장 상황이 포트폴리오 성과에 영향을 미쳤습니다.

exampleEn: Investors showed strong allegiance to the fund manager.
exampleKo: 투자자들은 펀드 매니저에게 강한 충성심을 보였습니다.

exampleEn: Diversification can alleviate investment risk.
exampleKo: 분산 투자는 투자 위험을 완화할 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: The contract terms were too ambiguous for investors.
The due diligence process was long and arduous.
Astute investors recognized the opportunity early.
The fund experienced high investor attrition.
The project was conducted under the auspices of the central bank.
We seek investors of the highest caliber.
Returns should be commensurate with the level of risk.
The investment thesis was compelling and well-researched.
Investors should not become complacent during bull markets.
A concerted effort by regulators stabilized the market.
exampleKo: 규제 당국의 협력한 노력이 시장을 안정시켰습니다.

exampleEn: Low interest rates are conducive to investment.
The fund manager is conscientious about risk management.
The investment is contingent upon regulatory approval.
The complexity of derivatives can be daunting for beginners.
exampleKo: 파생 상품의 복잡성은 초보자에게 벅찰 수 있습니다.

exampleEn: High fees deter some investors from participating.
exampleKo: 높은 수수료가 일부 투자자의 참여를 단념시킵니다.

exampleEn: Due diligence is essential before making investments.
It is difficult to discern genuine opportunities from scams.
The manager has discretionary authority over investments.
There is a significant disparity in returns across sectors.
exampleKo: 섹터 간 수익에 상당한 불균형이 있습니다.

exampleEn: This case exemplifies successful value investing.
exampleKo: 이 사례는 성공적인 가치 투자를 예시합니다.

exampleEn: The incumbent fund manager will retire next year.
exampleKo: 현직 펀드 매니저는 내년에 은퇴할 것입니다.

exampleEn: Achieving 20% annual returns is an extraordinary feat.
exampleKo: 연 20% 수익을 달성하는 것은 놀랄 만한 업적입니다.

exampleEn: Some investment decisions are irreversible.
exampleKo: 일부 투자 결정은 되돌릴 수 없습니다.
